ygData.messageBody:
female....i don't make male chars <pokes ilystil>

(\/)ystix

> From: Ilystil Drakonblayde <ilystil@...>
>
> At 02:47 AM 12/3/99 -0500, you wrote:
> >From: Mystik <mystik@...>
> >
> >ok it's weird <dunno how this happened...some glitch when i was dropped
> >one time or something like that...who knows>...i create a new char, and
> >they will have the relaxing-while-standing-still animations, but my
> >current chars don't...anyone know the name of the file that has those
> >animes so i can delete it and d/l it again so my current chars will have
> >the animes too?
>
> Is youre new char female or male? It was my understanding that the standing
> with arms at rest animation was removed for female characters due to the,
> uhm, prominence of certain features.
>
> =Ilystil Drakonblayde <Emef`Aitch> / The Blade of Tunare
